roleset.name: (cause to) be at an impasse, as in chess
roleset.note: STALEMATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.
STALEMATED-J NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: stalemate-v
example.text: According to Professor S D Muni , South Asia expert at the Jawaharal Nehru University , [the two - year peace talks between Colombo and the Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam -LRB- LTTE -RRB-]-1 are stalemated *T*-1.
example.arg: According to Professor S D Muni , South Asia expert at the Jawaharal Nehru University

example.name: stalemate-n
example.text: Andre Johnson might be close to breaking his stalemate with the Houston Texans.
